reviews.text: We had dinner at the restaurant because it caught our attention by its amazing design. We weren't disappointed by the food either, we had a very german meal: sausages and apple strudel for dessert. We also asked to change the sauerkraut to just a normal fresh salad and there was no problem with that, the waiter was very nice.

[Hotel review] I was surprised by this hotel! It has a quirky format with a sink inside the room and the bathroom being on the other side of the corridor, but the design was a great topic of conversation between my friends so I would say it was great to experience that hahah
Location is unbeatable, right next to the river and where all the authentic German places are :) the restaurant below the hotel has a very design too. It is also just ~8 min from the cathedral.
IT HAS AIR CONDITIONER!!! Best thing :P
The room and the bathroom were spotless, everything very clean and organized. The hotel reception staff was very friendly and attentive, I was able to leave my luggage there and while I was concerned because they just told me to leave it in the middle of the restaurant tables (second floor), they took care of it and it was there when I came back :)
But to be honest I grabbed my luggage and left and I don't think anyone saw me taking it, so maybe if someone else tried to take it they would have been able to. Hopefully it didn't happen so I leave 5 stars, but it would be good if the hotel could find a place to keep luggage safer to avoid a situation where someone just steals the suitcase and leaves haha
